reviews.review_msg: Amazing, interesting special topics class. Class was fun and generated good discussion. Robert so approachable and nice.  Course content was refreshing. It is very disorienting as a social science student to have my papers marked like English papers, but I adapted.

Expectations were very unclear for the paper and exams. 2 of 3 books were required for the class but ended up not necessary to read. Each week lecture slides are about 6 slides long - slides lacked detail. On the other hand, lectures were very entertaining, interesting and engaging.
